trans-unit.source: Log into the [Azure classic portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/), click **Mobile Services**, and then select your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: Log into the [Azure classic portal](https://manage.windowsazure.com/), click **Mobile Services**, and then select your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Click the **API** tab, and then click **Create**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **API** tab, and then click **Create**.

trans-unit.source: This displays the **Create a new custom API** dialog.
trans-unit.target: This displays the **Create a new custom API** dialog.

trans-unit.source: Type _completeall_ in **API name**, and then click the check button to create the new API.
trans-unit.target: Type _completeall_ in **API name**, and then click the check button to create the new API.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] With default permissions, anyone with the app key may call the custom API.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] With default permissions, anyone with the app key may call the custom API.

trans-unit.source: However, the application key is not considered a secure credential because it may not be distributed or stored securely.
trans-unit.target: However, the application key is not considered a secure credential because it may not be distributed or stored securely.

trans-unit.source: Consider restricting access to only authenticated users for additional security.
trans-unit.target: Consider restricting access to only authenticated users for additional security.

trans-unit.source: Click on **completeall** in the API table.
trans-unit.target: Click on **completeall** in the API table.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Script** tab, replace the existing code with the following code, then click **Save**.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Script** tab, replace the existing code with the following code, then click **Save**.

trans-unit.source: This code uses the [mssql object] to access the **todoitem** table directly to set the `complete` flag on all items.
trans-unit.target: This code uses the [mssql object] to access the **todoitem** table directly to set the `complete` flag on all items.

trans-unit.source: Because the **exports.post** function is used, clients send a POST request to perform the operation.
trans-unit.target: Because the **exports.post** function is used, clients send a POST request to perform the operation.

trans-unit.source: The number of changed rows is returned to the client as an integer value.
trans-unit.target: The number of changed rows is returned to the client as an integer value.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] The [request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj554218.aspx) and [response](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn303373.aspx) object supplied to custom API functions are implemented by the [Express.js library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=309046).
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] The [request](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/jj554218.aspx) and [response](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windowsazure/dn303373.aspx) object supplied to custom API functions are implemented by the [Express.js library](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=309046).
